div.head: Report:
div.p: The main objective was to obtain a high resolution crystal structure of amino acid: [carrier protein] ligase complexed with the carrier protein. Since preliminary results showed high flexibility of the carrier protein inside the complex, dehydration experiment was performed to reduce flexibility and obtain better electron density maps. Crystals were exposed to controlled dehydration (97.5% -83.5% humidity), with slight reduction of one of the crystal axes, but no significant change was noticed. One of the difficulties was that crystals didn't survive more than 10 second exposures to X-rays at room temperature. Around 60 crystals (2.5-3.5 Ã… resolution) were used for the dehydration experiment. Four data sets were collected at 100K after dehydration treatment (94.5% and 87.5% humidity, respectively), but unfortunately no reduction in flexibility of the carrier protein was noticed.
